awards:
第12届柏林国际电影节(1962)
　　主竞赛单元 金熊奖(提名) Tim Whelan Jr

writer.name: 韦斯利·鲁格尔斯 Wesley Ruggles

introduction: Two children are placed on a boat to Hong Kong, but before reaching the mainland they are sold by an unscrupulous boatman to a brothel. The cliched "hooker-with-a-heart-of-gold" helps them to get to Hong Kong, where they are to meet their uncle. On the way, however, they get robbed of thelittle money they have. They arrive, but only to receive the news that their uncle has died. An American production filmed on location in Hong Kong with a Hollywood-bred cast.
